title: MD
biography: Daniel R. Weinberger is a professor of psychiatry, neurology and neuroscience at Johns Hopkins University and Director and CEO of the Lieber Institute for Brain Development, which opened in 2011.
aiSummary: Daniel R. Weinberger is a neurogenetics specialist with an H-index of 179 at Johns Hopkins University (Faculty). Has been published in Cell, Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences, Science. Based in United States.
